Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library

  • public class Library
extends Object
    Library class represents the overall book library created with LibraryBook class and enables certain library functions such as; searching, adding, removing books etc.
    Version:
    1.2 07/12/16
    Author:
    Bartu Atabek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Library() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(String title, String author)
      adds a new book with the given title and author to the first available non-null property
      String findByTitle(String title)
      finds books from the liblary with the given title
      boolean isEmpty()
      checks whether there are books in the library or not
      boolean remove(Library book)
      removes the specified book from the library
      String toString()
      String representation of the library that gives book properties

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        public Library()

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        checks whether there are books in the library or not
        Returns:
        returns true if there are no books in the library

      • toString

        public String toString()
        String representation of the library that gives book properties
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of the library, one book per line (or a message if library is empty)

      • add

        public void add(String title,
                String author)
        adds a new book with the given title and author to the first available non-null property
        Parameters:
        title - is the title of the book
        author - is the author of the book

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Library book)
        removes the specified book from the library
        Parameters:
        book - is any book in the library
        Returns:
        returns false if the book is no in library

      • findByTitle

        public String findByTitle(String title)
        finds books from the liblary with the given title
        Parameters:
        title - is the title of a book in the library
        Returns:
        returns the first book with the given title or null if no such book is found
